name: Winter Takes All
description:
Winter Takes All!

You are a druid tasked by your Deity to prevent demons from being thawed out and unleashed on the world.  Use mana to keep those demons frozen.  The longer you can keep them thawed the more Favor (score points) you will earn. Once enough demons thaw out, then it's game over.  A dragon will come by intermittently to try to thaw out  a demon to make your life job harder.

This is my submission to the OpenGameArt.org's Winter Game Jam 2022

This game is inspired by/a clone of a Javascript game called "Udder Insanity!" except with OpenGameArt asset artwork and the theme of "Old things being uncovered by thawing ice."  Unfortunately I wasn't able to find the source code of the original game, so I tried to focus on the feel of the "frantic" juggling of multi-tasking that the original game had when designing the gameplay.

Reference:

Made with Godot Engine

Instructions:

Arrow keys to move

Space to interact

Use Mana freeze the demons and prevent them from being thawed out -- If they thaw out, you lose lives.  Once you are out of lives, it's game over!  Tip: Hold down space to freeze demons faster.

If you run out of mana you can recharge at the Mana Vortex.

A Dragon will come by at random intervals and instantly thaw out one of the demons if you don't stop the Dragon in time.

Use the Ballista to chase the Dragon away.

Escape to quit
